name: kristal adkins
text: As far as Pizza Hut goes it does the basic. If you order to go, make sure you check your order. They are skimpy with toppings and sauces. Staff is very nice. Once went inside to eat dinner, we had to clean off the remnants of weed on our table before setting down.

text: Most Pizza Huts are good. This one serves great food, has great, hard working staff and is clean. It's also conveniently located and has a good parking lot.

text: Did not check pizzas before I left restaurant. Got home and had wrong pizza. Tried to call, but no one answered the phone. It just rang and rang. Drove all the way back to restaurant to get correct pizza with no apology or effort to make it right.üò°
